statements: DELETE FROM vendor_reports WHERE vendor_name = 'Ace Suppliers';
DELETE FROM vendor_reports WHERE expense > 10000 AND cost_savings < 5000
DELETE FROM vendor_expenses WHERE vendor_id = 100 AND expense_type = 'Travel'
DELETE FROM negotiation_outcomes WHERE savings_amount > 5000 AND negotiation_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM vendor_expenses WHERE vendor_id = 100 AND expense_date < '2021-06-01'
DELETE FROM cost_savings WHERE saving_amount > 5000 AND saving_date BETWEEN '2021-07-01' AND '2021-08-31'
DELETE FROM vendor_expenses WHERE vendor_id = 101 AND expense_type = 'Travel'
DELETE FROM negotiation_outcomes WHERE negotiation_result = 'Successful' AND vendor_id = 203
DELETE FROM CostSavings WHERE saving_amount > 500 AND saving_date < '2022-01-01';
